title: Shouldnt the shutdown of a pentakiller have a cooler name?
body:
http://www.voosreview.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/LeagueOfLegends-Shutdown.jpg

Made a custom game to lock my Mastery icon to my Q ability and I played {{champion:35}} 

While playing I managed to get a couple of PENTAKILLS!! but in one PENTAKILL!! 
I got killed by a enemy {{summoner:14}} so my PENTAKILL!! was shutdown by a enemy that used {{summoner:14}} R.I.P
Then I only heard a Shutdown after someone ended my PENTAKILL and for some reason that just felt wrong... mehehehehe
http://pa1.narvii.com/5764/bff3ced6b7a79a0ea4e97169c497e0d8d783c1e9_hq.gif


So I wanted to ask GD if a PENTAKILLER shutdown
Should be given a better name or not then just a ordinary shutdown we have now...
